It means we can't solve the climate crisis without treating it like a crisis. And to this day we never have. Not once. Not one single time. Ever.
#MindTheGap

full_text: So let‚Äôs all join in spreading awareness. It could literally save lives. Autism is not a disease. It‚Äôs not something you ‚Äùhave‚Äù. It‚Äôs definitely not ‚Äùcaused‚Äù by anything like vaccine or diet. 6/7
text: So let‚Äôs all join in spreading awareness. It could literally save lives. Autism is not a disease. It‚Äôs not something you ‚Äùhave‚Äù. It‚Äôs definitely not ‚Äùcaused‚Äù by anything like vaccine or diet. 6/7

full_text: Sadly, today the level of awareness is so low. So many go undiagnosed and will therefore not receive the help they need and may go their whole life believing something is wrong with them. 5/7
text: Sadly, today the level of awareness is so low. So many go undiagnosed and will therefore not receive the help they need and may go their whole life believing something is wrong with them. 5/7

full_text: Almost everywhere there are very limited resources to give autistic people the necessary support. Without these adjustments autism can turn into a disability. But under the right circumstances it can truly be a gift and turn into something you - and society - can benefit from.4/7
text: Almost everywhere there are very limited resources to give autistic people the necessary support. Without these adjustments autism can turn into a disability. But under the right circumstances it can truly be a gift and turn into something you - and society - can benefit from.4/7

full_text: That more people are diagnosed with autism etc isn‚Äôt because there is an ‚Äúinflation‚Äù in diagnoses but since awareness is increasing and many highly sensitive people experience stress related problems in modern society which gives them reason to suspect they‚Äôre on the spectrum.3/7
text: That more people are diagnosed with autism etc isn‚Äôt because there is an ‚Äúinflation‚Äù in diagnoses but since awareness is increasing and many highly sensitive people experience stress related problems in modern society which gives them reason to suspect they‚Äôre on the spectrum.3/7

full_text: Today, so many (especially girls) remain undiagnosed. The reasons for that are often lack of awareness, prejudices and the fact that many still see autism as a ‚Äúdisease‚Äù or something that has to hold you back. 2/7
